short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate the predicted score when watching live football
short.vi: Tính tỉ số dự đoán khi xem trực tiếp bóng đá

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to the Mbscore Chrome app! This application helps you as a troll application to give random scores of matches like Chaco For Ever - Defensa y Justicia, Spain - Scotland, Netherlands - France, England - Australia, and many other matches.

Setting:

Open Chrome browser.
Visit the Chrome Web Store.
Search for "Mbscore" in the search box.
Select the "Mbscore" widget and press the "Install" button.
Use:

Select the match you want to see fun predictions for from the list of available matches.
